CustomField.formula: (if (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)<> Pay_Rate_Date__c ,Text(Pay_Rate_Date__c) &"► Rate of Pay"& BR() ,"")) & (if (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)<> Status_Exempt_Date__c ,Text(Status_Exempt_Date__c) &"► Marital Status and Exemptions"& BR() ,"")) & (if (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)<> Local_Withlding_Date__c ,Text(Local_Withlding_Date__c) &"► Applicable Local Withholding"& BR() ,"")) & (if (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)<> Address_Date__c ,Text(Address_Date__c) &"► Address"& BR() ,"")) & (if (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)<> Dept_Structure_Dte__c ,Text(Dept_Structure_Dte__c) &"► Department Structure"& BR() ,"")) & (if (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)<> Vol_Deduct_Date__c ,Text(Vol_Deduct_Date__c ) &"► Voluntary Deductions"& BR() ,"")) & (if (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)<> DD_Info_Date__c ,Text(DD_Info_Date__c) &"► Direct Deposit Information"& BR() ,""))& (if (DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)<> Hire_Date_Date__c ,Text(Hire_Date_Date__c) &"► Hire Date"& BR() ,""))
CustomField.label: History Tracking Emp Info
